## blockRendering.Renderer.makeDrawer\_() method

Create a new instance of the renderer's drawer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected makeDrawer_(block: BlockSvg, info: RenderInfo): Drawer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg.md) | The block to render. |
|  info | [RenderInfo](./blockly.blockrendering.renderinfo.md) | An object containing all information needed to render this block. |

**Returns:**

[Drawer](./blockly.blockrendering.drawer.md)

The drawer.
